description: Add PRD format validation before execution starts. Validate required fields, acceptanceCriteria format, and catch common mistakes early to prevent cryptic jq errors during execution.

userStories.title: Validate PRD structure before execution
userStories.description: As a user, I want PRD validation to run before execution starts so that I catch format errors early
acceptanceCriteria: Checks for required fields: project, userStories, id, title, priority
Verifies acceptanceCriteria is array of strings (not objects)
Validates all story IDs are unique
Test with valid and invalid PRDs

userStories.title: Provide clear error messages for invalid PRDs
userStories.description: As a user, I want clear error messages when my PRD is invalid so that I know exactly what to fix
acceptanceCriteria: Each validation error shows specific field and issue
Uses user-friendly language (not jq syntax errors)

userStories.title: Catch acceptanceCriteria object mistake
userStories.description: As a user, I want the validator to catch when I accidentally use objects for acceptanceCriteria instead of strings
acceptanceCriteria: Show clear error: 'acceptanceCriteria must be array of strings, not objects'
Test with PRD that has acceptanceCriteria as objects
Verify clear error message is shown
userStories.notes: This was the bug that caused 9/10 failures in original benchmark
